data.trigger: When you cause one or more enemies to lose HP
data.description:
Choose yourself or an ally who is your focus: if the chosen creature is in Crisis, they recover an amount of Hit Points equal to 【5 + (the number of filled sections in your Brainwave Clock, multiplied by 5)】.

  • Cost: @LOSS[max(5, (&cs('brainwave-clock')*5)) mp]{Psychic Gift}

  • Target: @GAIN[5+(&cs('brainwave-clock')*5) hp]{Life Transference}

  • Resolution: @CLOCK[brainwave-clock update 1]{Advance Brainwave Clock}
